name: Duck Hunt 2 (itch)
description:
This is our submission for the 2021 Global Game Jam! We smashed out a (rough) game in PICO-8 (which is such a great little tool for jams).

The theme was 'lost and found' so we based our game on the viral video going around last year of the mother duck losing her ducklings down a drain pipe: https://www.reddit.com/r/therewasanattempt/comments/in1al8/to_follow_mom/

Thankfully they were saved by a kind stranger! https://www.reddit.com/r/therewasanattempt/comments/in8lde/to_follow_mom_part_2_...

So as a tribute, in our #ggjonline game you play the man finding the lost ducks in a totally realistic underground drain pipe labyrinth!

Enjoy!

Made by TBD Game Company for the 2021 Global Game Jam. Based on advanced micro platformer by @matthughson.
